channel.title: datapasta on Javier Tamayo-Leiva
channel.description: Recent content in datapasta on Javier Tamayo-Leiva

item.title: From data loading to visualization in R (easily)
item.description: Table of Content Introduction Bring your data to R {datapasta} How does {datapasta} work? Plot your data with {ggplot2} Basic plot Components of a plot in {ggplot2} Set Colors Choose the graphic with the geom objects Final Plot Introduction Many times the reason people approach the R language is because they have seen that it is a great tool for achieving better visualizations.
